title: IGNITE-15077 -- Implement Quartz Based Scheduler
body: This commit introduces a quartz based implementation of Ignite Scheduler. This commit also refactors existing implementation to be more abstract and introduces a factory like scheduler that can be used as a single point of interaction and that takes care of delegating to the correct scheduler.

title: IGNITE-14307 Use statistics in cost model.
body: IgniteMdSelectivity tries to use statistics to estimate selectivity of index and table scan.

title: IGNITE-15045 .NET: Fix NullPointerException in ContinuousQuery with security enabled
body: Add null check to `SecurityAwareFilter`, because `PlatformContinuousQueryImpl` always sets itself as a remote filter, but serializes as null when the actual filter is not present.

title: IGNITE-15159 : Manual encrypted snapshots.
body:
At the moment, cluster snapshos don't include encrypted caches. The EncryptionFileIO must be added to snapshotting to copy page delta changes during concurrent updates (see IEP-43 for details about copying cache partition files).
As first implementation, let's introduce manually replaceable encrypted snapshots.


Changes:

1. Added encrypted file IO to the snapshot deltas to hold and merge encrypted data changes.
2. To keep consistency between snapshot and the persistent store, re-encryption and master key change is now blocked during snapshot operations and opposite.
3. The snapshot tests have got ‚Äòencrypted‚Äô option and run in both encrypted and 'plain' mode.

title: IGNITE-14999 : Support snapshot encryption with same master-key v2.
body:
This PR suggests support of encrypted snapshots with same master key.

Changes:

Added encrypted file IO to the snapshot deltas to get ability to assemble encrypted snapshot data.
Added general-purpose records to snapshot meta to transfer encryption keys (encrypted by master key).
To keep consistency of the keys and encrypted data between snapshot and the persistent store, blocked re-encryption and master key change during snapshot operations and opposite.
Snapshot tests now have ‚Äòencrypted‚Äô option.

Second version of PR #9230 . Changed: another variant of absent group key processing.

title: Ignite-14999 : Support snapshot encryption with same master-key.
body:
This PR suggests support of encrypted snapshots with same master key. 

Changes: 

1. Added encrypted file IO to the snapshot deltas to get ability to assemble encrypted snapshot data. 
2. Added general-purpose records to snapshot meta to transfer encryption keys (encrypted by master key). 
3. To keep consistency of the keys and encrypted data between snapshot and the persistent store, blocked re-encryption and master key change during snapshot operations and opposite.
4. Snapshot tests now have ‚Äòencrypted‚Äô option.

body:
